overview: "Deepest Darkness, Flaming Sun" is a short experimental film about the Svalbard Archipelago in the Norwegian Arctic. Narrated by wilderness guide Marte Agneberg Dahl, the film features altered Super 8mm film footage of the region. Dahl speaks about her travels in the Arctic, climate change, walruses and the regionâ€™s history.
title: Deepest Darkness, Flaming Sun
